Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: FROM PECKHAM TO THE PALACE!!🎖️ Swung by Windsor Castle to pick up an MBE for services to young people and STEM through Motivez 👑This one is for US!! ❤️🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #GodDid #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: George Imafidon MBE for services to young people and STEM!!🎖️🤯  This is for that little kid in Peckham and all the young people out there having to overcome countless barriers.Who would have thought that first bike at 9 years old would inspire all I do today as a humanitarian engineer 🚲👨🏾‍💻I want to say a massive thank you to whoever nominated me, family, friends, mentors and all of you for constantly putting your trust in us and supporting all the work at Motivez over these past 8 years 🎉There’s still A LOT of work for us all to do to break down barriers to STEM careers, and support young people from underserved backgrounds to become the next innovators - the focus for our next 8 years and beyond. Serving our way to top. ❤️The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #YoungEngineerOfTheYear #STEM #MBE

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE JUST SECURED FUNDING FROM BEYONCÉ!! 🐝🥳Over the last weekend, Motivez was chosen out of 400 amazing organisations by the BeyGOOD Foundation to support more young people to access STEM jobs! 🚀 We stepped into the room to celebrate the community of Black entrepreneurs and social Impact leaders over lunch and left surprised with a $10,000 cheque! 💰 Beyoncé has since donated $2 million from her Renaissance tour to make all this happen. This is what it looks like to keep the ladder down 💯 The funding will build on the impact of our employability programmes, like Application Season, to create more free resources and support for our young people hunting for their dream jobs 🚀 Massive thank you to the Carter-Knowles family Mathew Knowles, Ivy McGregor, MSDUK and everyone supporting us for making this possible! ❤️The marathon continues! 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #BeyGood #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I’ve just been told that an Underground Station has been renamed after me for National Engineering Day! 🤯🎉One of my first-ever engineering work experiences was actually at TFL… Harrison Ofoma took a chance on me and exposed me to the transport world that set me up for all I do now shaping the future of Sustainable Motorsport with Lewis Hamilton’s electric racing team, TEAM X44  and Prodrive 🏎️⚡️ Engineers have been behind this type of work, improving everyday lives, for generations, so I’m grateful to be listed as one of the Engineering Icons shaping tomorrow! 🚀You can view the map online on the TfL website and in-person at the London Transport Museum - I’m at North Wembley station 🚊A massive thank you to the team at Royal Academy of Engineering and Transport for London for the recognition 💙 The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #NationalEngineeringDay #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I’m happy to share that I’ve been promoted to Race Engineer for Lewis Hamilton's X44 Vida Carbon Racing team! 🏎 ⚡️ Grateful for the opportunity to step up for Season 3 and inspire many more young people to keep dreaming and pursue those STEM careers 🙏🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #YoungEngineerOfTheYear #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I’m excited to finally announce…that I just got into the Harvard Business School! 🎉 …the business school BUILDING!They let me inside!I asked the security guard politely and he said yes. Don’t give up on your dreams 🙏🏾😅If you were looking for the REAL announcement, don’t worry that’s coming tomorrow 😉👀Don’t take life too seriously and happy Monday! ✌🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #Boston #ItsNotEasy #Troll

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Huge thanks to both Foundervine and Lloyds Banking Group for the recognition. Chuffed to have won the inaugural ‘Changemaker of the Year Award’!! 🤯🙌🏾🏆As the most prestigious award of the night, this honour acknowledges an individual that has made a transformative and lasting impact on their community, industry, or society at large 🌍 To truly transform anything, it takes a village. I want to honour my INCREDIBLE community and team over at Motivez, as we continue to make STEM careers more accessible for thousands of young people 🚀 These moments are only possible because of all of you that support the mission, so THANK YOU, and God for continuing to use me 🙏🏾Let’s keep serving our way to top! ❤️The marathon continues! 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Purpose

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: IT’S OFFICIAL!! 🚀I’ve joined the Corporate Advisory Board of the Hult International Business School!! 🎉   As a humanitarian engineer, I’ll be supporting the executive board and 4,500+ students in expanding the $180m non-profit organisation whilst developing the school’s curriculum, industry links and career development support so all the students can make a real impact in STEM and beyond 🙌🏾Looking forward to meeting some more students as I visit the campus’s across 3 continents including Boston, London, San Francisco and Dubai 🌍It’s so important to me to be a voice for the many that feel unseen and drive the change that we need the most in our institutions. God is GOOD and when it’s your time, it’s your time! 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁  #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #TheRealAnnouncement #NewRole

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE WON!!! 🏆🥳 I was named the Entrepreneur Rising Star of the Year by Barclays and The Black British Business Awards for our work at Motivez! 🎉Combining the engineering journey with entrepreneurship hasn’t always been easy 😬However, finding innovative ways to train thousands of underserved young people break into the STEM space, alongside connecting organisations with the diverse and skilled talent has been nothing short of purpose-driven 🙏🏾I’m forever grateful to all of you who have supported the Motivez journey and continue to inspire me ❤️🚀 The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #BBBAwards

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE DID IT! Completed the 2024 LONDON MARATHON with 42.2km in the bag!! ✅🏅I finally beat my record by 43 mins with a 4:00:00!! 🤯 Does that class as a sub-four? 😅 This year, I decided to run to support 60 local kids in South London with a STEM community programme 🚀 You can still support by VOTING for Motivez (Sustainable Southwark) and sharing with the link in the first comment - it takes 5 seconds!👇🏾Can’t thank my Nov Run Club family, friends, fellow runners and the crowd enough for coming out with the good vibes and keeping me going ❤️👏🏾I’ll be wearing this medal for the rest of the month, respectfully 😌The marathon continues  🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #LondonMarathon2024 #Running #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Grateful to be recognised by The Black British Business Awards and Barclays as one of the rising entrepreneurs in the UK! 🏆When I first started shaping my career, I knew I had a big challenge ahead of me combining purpose, entrepreneurship, and engineering.Fast forward almost a decade later, and staying true to that vision has helped thousands of young people to break into the STEM space 👩‍💻 I’m thankful to everyone who has supported the Motivez journey over these past 8 years 🚀 Entrepreneurs and engineers can come from anywhere - and they look like us 💪🏾Looking forward to the finals in October and wishing good luck to all the incredible nominees!The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE DID IT! Completed my 1st LONDON MARATHON with 42.2km in the bag!! ✅🏅The journey was TOUGH from start to finish. From enjoying far too much pounded yam and jollof (the real one) in Nigeria 🇳🇬, to falling pretty ill RIGHT BEFORE marathon day, I stepped into this marathon with one goal in mind - just get it done 🏁Thankfully the first half was comfortable, but the 2nd half is where is all started going left. From missing re-fuel stops and cramps kicking in, there were definitely some points I thought I was a goner 😅 Can’t thank my Nov Run Club family, friends and the crowd enough for coming out with the good vibes and keeping me going ❤️👏🏾As a result, I will definitely be wearing this medal for the next MONTH, respectfully 😌We may have finished this marathon, but the real marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #LondonMarathon #Running

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: It’s my birthday! 🎉🎉Feeling blessed to celebrate this new chapter in Jamaica! 🇯🇲 Grateful to God for the man I’m becoming and the lives I get to impact ❤️ It’s been a blessing to see this mission of ‘making STEM sexy’ unfold whilst bringing my love for serving and motorsport together as a humanitarian engineer - just look at everything we’ve achieved in such a short time!!🏎️ 🌎 🤯  I hope I have, in some small way, helped you to keep up the hope 🙏🏾 I know that kid from Peckham would be smiling from ear to ear right now because we’ve come a LONG way…  The marathon continues 🏁  #TheKidFromPeckham #BirthdayMonth

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Popped over to Downing St. yesterday to celebrate Black History Month 👌🏾Randomly bumped into a young lady that joined the Motivez Application Season programme when we first launched it back in 2020!She spoke about it how it changed her life back in COVID - and how she went from feeling lost with no guidance to an internship at Lazard to landing her dream placement at Unilever 👏🏾 It’s always been about creating priceless moments like these! ❤️If you know anyone else like her still looking to get those dream jobs in STEM and beyond, tell them to sign up to the FREE Application Season Programme - 50% of the spaces are already gone and the deadline is this SUNDAY 🚀 - link in first comment! 👇🏾 The marathon continues 🙏🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #DayInALife

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Allow me to re-introduce myself! 👀My LinkedIn community has grown a lot over the past few months, here’s a re-introduction - especially to those of you who are new.👋🏾 Hi, I’m George! I’m a humanitarian engineer, entreprenuer and speaker passionate about making STEM roles more accessible to ALL young people and building more purposeful leaders. 🔧 From age 7, I became pretty obsessed with building things. I grew up fixing the bikes of my friends in my local community in Peckham, South London, and since then I’ve been creating solutions for underserved communities and worked around the world firms such as Google, McKinsey & Company, Prodrive and Rolls-Royce where, through designing a novel component, I managed to save them over £50 million.❓ I co-founded Motivez alongside Muizz and over the last 8 years our company has directly trained and supported 9,000+ young people to access entry-level STEM jobs. We work with some of the world’s biggest brands on our grassroots, employability and advocacy programmes and have been backed by the likes of Idris Elba, Beyoncé and most recently The Royal Family with funding and an MBE for services to STEM and young people. 🏎️ I eventually traded working on the two wheels for the four wheels, and now work as a Race Engineer for Lewis Hamilton’s electric race team, TEAM X44.🌍 I’ve been working on sustainable solutions to the world’s most pressing challenges through engineering and tech for over a decade. 🤝 My roles extend to the governance level after joining Lewis Hamilton in 2020 on the Board of The Hamilton Commission to improve representation in STEM and becoming a trustee for the Co-op Foundation. It’s been a privilege to raise and distribute millions of pounds for young people.🏃🏾‍♂️ You can often find me running and I’ve done a few marathons to support some amazing causes in the UK and Nigeria 🇳🇬 💡 Linkedin has been a key platform for me over the years to inspire, share the journey, and send the ladder down through connecting with you all.Thank you all for the warm messages, engagement and constant encouragement. It doesn’t go unnoticed!Now it's your turn! Don’t be a stranger, tell me about yourself, let's explore if we can build together as we plan for 2024 😊 The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: A huge thank you to HSBC UK and UKBBS for the recognition of Top Black Entrepreneurs to Watch this year!! 🏆Forever grateful to my team and every one of you that’s supported the Motivez journey over the last 8 years ❤️Hopefully I can inspire many others to know that they belong in the STEM space too - entrepreneurs, engineers and technologists can come from anywhere, and they look like us 💪🏾Check out the full list on UK Black Business Show website 🗞️ The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Entrepreneurship #GodDid

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE DID ITT!! “The BEST conference The Amos Bursary has ever had”! ✅ 🎉 When I became an AB Scholar in 2014 and attended the first summer conference, I could have never imagined what we could all achieve together 💭 One of my dreams to give back was that one day I’d be able to create that same experience for hundreds of other young people ❤️9+ years later, Isaiah and I co-curated this years conference with a phenomenal team! The theme was: ‘DISRUPTION: Steps for Radical Change’ 🚀🙌🏾We assembled some of the best disrupters across the UK to share their invaluable insights on how we can make a greater impact in our respective industries 💎From the whole AB family, I want to say a massive thank you for being part of life-changing experience. Forever grateful for your time and I can’t wait to see the impact you all go onto make.Special S/O to our phenomenal guest speakers Valerie Amos, Sara Rankin, Lavinya Stennett FRSA, Sophia Thakur, Courtney Daniella Boateng & Renée Kapuku, Kenny Imafidon, Hannah Awonuga, Tom Hulme, Lex Fefegha, Wilfrid Obeng, Joseph Zeal Henry and Clint 419 🔥 The MARATHON continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Disruption #ABConference2023 #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I just delivered the Commencement Speech at the Graduation Ceremony for the Hult International Business School Postgrads! 🎉🎓It was a blessing to speak to 900+ graduates and guests from 60+ countries about finding purpose through serving their way to the top in their respective fields 🚀 It’s something I’ve personally been able to find throughout the Motivez journey and my mission as a humanitarian engineer 🌍 Massive congrats to the CLASS OF 2023 and I hope you all press on with purpose in this new beginning 🙌🏾“What people say about you when you leave, is a testament to the legacy you leave behind!” 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 P.S. Honorary doctorate on the way 👨🏾‍🎓👀#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Graduation #Speaking

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: All it takes is ONE opportunity to turn things around!! 🏆🍾You’ll always have more losses than wins - it comes with the territory. Don’t give up in the middle 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #SustainableMotorsport

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: MY FIRST RACE WIN AS THE RACE ENGINEER WITH TEAM X44!! 🏆🏎️ So much work goes into moments like this, so a huge shoutout to the legendary drivers and team for winning our homecoming race 🇬🇧👏🏾 This was definitely a rollercoaster weekend and we didn’t get the result we wanted at the end of the double-header but that’s motorsport - plenty positives and lessons learned 🙏🏾Grateful we could wrap up round 3 on the top step of the podium and get our first trophy for the season in Scotland🥇The Extreme E championship fight is looking tighter than ever with 6 races to go! We go again in Sardinia in a few weeks 🇮🇹⚡️ For now, I’ll be sleeping with these trophies until further notice 😅The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #YoungEngineerOfTheYear #SustainableMotorsport #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: From PECKHAM 🇬🇧 to Chile 🇨🇱- I’m off to the Atacama desert this week! ✈️ Over the weekend, we’ll be racing the electric cars in the worlds oldest desert to raise awareness of the climate issues in the area ⚡️Last time I was in South America, I won my  first championship with TEAM X44 in Season 2 🏆🏎️ 13 year old George fixing bikes in Peckham wouldn’t even believe this was a possible! Now we’re normalising it and taking the humanitarian engineer mission all around the world 🌎 Forever grateful for times like this 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #RaceEngineering #SustainableMotorsport Extreme E

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We’re in the papers for the RIGHT reasons this time around!! 🙏🏾🙌🏾So proud of you brother Kenny Imafidon! You kept the pen in your hand, and now we can all read your powerful story 🖊️ I won’t lie, it was an emotional read, but I’m grateful you never let the tragedy consume you or go to waste. A true champ! ❤️Make sure you don’t miss out, grab your copy today! 📚 The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #ThatPeckhamBoy #DayInALife #BlackHistoryMonth

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: A big thank you to the BBC for featuring Motivez and my unconventional journey into entrepreneurship and race engineering with Lewis Hamilton’s Team X44 on BBC Radio London today 🚀 Engineers can come from anywhere, and they look like us 💪🏾Shout out to the team at Royal Academy of Engineering and Transport for London for the recognition 💙 You can listen to the full broadcast with the link in the first comment 👇🏾(Timestamp: 7:26)The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #NationalEngineeringDay #TFL Royal Academy of Engineering

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We’ve finally got our NEW Motivez OFFICE with a bit of character! 🤩🚀We want the space to be a hub for our young people so we’ll be opening our doors to the community in a few weeks. Stay tuned for the upcoming newsletters 👀P.S. If you’re passionate about social impact and developing the next generation of young changemakers in STEM, we’re wrapping up hiring for a few full-time roles this summer! Check out the jobs on the Motivez page and please share with your  network 🙏🏾❤️The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #NewOffice #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Guess who’s hosting an ENGINEERING PODCAST?! 👀🎙️🎉 I recently joined the Queen Elizabeth Prize for Engineering to host the ‘Create the Future’ podcast alongside the legendary Roma Agrawal MBE who’s a force to be reckoned with in the STEM space! 👏🏾 I’m looking forward to facilitating some relatable and fun conversations that humanise engineering for our communities. Over the coming weeks, I’ll be speaking with some of the world’s best engineers, thinkers, and designers to debate how our future should look 🚀 Any topics that you’re curious to learn more about? Let me know! 😊 The first episode is now LIVE and in the comments - hope you enjoy it👇🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #YoungEngineerOfTheYear #STEM #Podcast

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE’VE FINALLY WON after 4 unsuccessful races in Sardinia over the past 3 years!! 🏆🏎️🇮🇹So much work goes into moments like these, so a huge shoutout to the legendary drivers and team that gave it everything 👏🏾 Grateful we could end round 8 on the top step and get our 2nd trophy for the season 🙏🏾🥇We go again in Chile in a few weeks! 🇨🇱⚡️ The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Motorsport

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This time last week, I was accepting the award for the Rising Entrepreneur of the Year!! 🎉🏆Huge thank you to Barclays and The Black British Business Awards for the recognition 🙏🏾Let’s keep serving our way to the top 🚀The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #HumanitarianEngineer #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Investing in women in STEM! 🚀No better feeling than giving the Motivez community life-changing experiences that we wish we had! 🙌🏾Jadyn joined us in Year 12 on our ‘Application Season’ programme, became a Motivez ambassador and it’s been beautiful to see her growth over the years. She’s finally wrapped up her A-levels so to celebrate, we gave her the full VIP hospitality experience at the Formula E race 🤩Priceless moments but it’s giving bring your daughter to work day 😂🏎️ If you’re around at the Formula E race today, let me know!👌🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset#SustainableMotorsport #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: From PECKHAM 🇬🇧 to BOSTON 🇺🇸 - I’m flying out this week for a little surprise! ✈️ 👀Last time I was in the US, it was 5+ years ago…I’ll never forget stepping off that Virgin plane and witnessing the strong sense of pride, self-determination and can-do mentality 🏃🏾‍♂️ I met dozens of kids much younger than me refusing to settle, being resourceful and making no excuses. It humbled me and reminded me of the importance of “doing the most” as I built Motivez 💯 Excited to be back and share some news, but for now please keep sending those recommendations and DM me if you’re in town 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #HumanitarianEngineer

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Teaching young people how to network - effectively 🔑 Yesterday, I delivered a keynote to hundreds of young people at the 2023 EBV Conference on creating authentic connections for opportunities 🎤I’ve done 100s of applications…and I’ve been rejected from most of them. Yet, my most transformational opportunities have RARELY been through just an application form 📄Learning how to build meaningful professional relationships, and showcasing your value is one of the best skills to start developing.The hardest step is the first but you’ve got this 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 Empowered By Vee #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #YouthLeadership

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: There’s a lot to be grateful for this June! 🙏🏾🎖️ Beyond the MBE announcement and Motivez 8th Year anniversary, I took up a new position and we ran our first Driven By Us event!! ✅🤩Over the last year, we brought the motorsport community together based on our shared experiences to create a safe space for those coming up behind us 🙏🏾 Since then, we’ve created an official club with Motorsport UK, which is a first of its kind, and came together for a strategy day to shape the direction with the community. As nominated Vice President of Driven by Us, I’m looking forward to building on the work of Motivez and making a bigger dent on the motorsport space with our programmes and events - driving STEM on and off the track 🏎️ A massive thank you to James Dornor, Jahee Campbell-Brennan for pushing to make this a reality and everyone supporting! The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Motorsport #Community

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We raised a staggering £266,000 to help build Great Ormond Street Hospital Children's Charity new Children’s Cancer Centre!! 🎉🏥🙌🏾GOSH plays a critical part in supporting children with healthcare needs, alongside their families. I spoke on the High Performance panel at the most recent fundraising dinner - about how we can perform at our best to overcome challenges and support incredible organisations like GOSH.This building of hope will bring together some amazing research, the latest STEM products and facilities - to make it a world class centre.Massive congrats to the amazing team and all the donors for making days like this possible!I hope the work we’re all doing gives some more kids their childhoods back, so they can go on and reach their full potential. We’re now one step closer to doing just that.The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ForTheKids #GOSH

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Happy New Year LinkedIn Family! 🎉🙌🏾I spent the last few weeks in solitude to rest and reflect on a truly unbelievable year…🎖️ Receiving an MBE for services to STEM and young people and TfL renaming an underground station after me for National Engineering Day🚀 Partnering with amazing organisations and individuals like Beyoncé to launch multiple sold-out Motivez programmes and events to directly impact the lives of 2,000+ young people through Motivez🎤 12+ talks around the world to empower thousands of young people, entrepreneurs and leaders and incredible recognition from HSBC, KPMG, Barclays, Lloyds Banking Group, Foundervine and UK Black Business Show🏎️ Promoted to the Race Engineer for Lewis Hamilton’s TEAM X44 with 10 races around the world and 4 podiums 🌍 Ticking off my bucket list with travels to 9+ countries and my first London MarathonThis year, I’m focused on becoming a much better leader and not letting my standards slip.Thanks to everyone that’s supported me and Motivez this last year, it doesn’t go unnoticed 💙—P.S. If you’re a student still planning to maximise your 2024, Motivez and Empowered By Vee are here to help you create your most fulfilling academic year yet! If you want to learn actionable principles for how Vee K. and approach it, sign up now. Last year we sold out quick so grab your spot using the link in the first comment 👇🏾Bring on 2024!!The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Gratitude

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This time last month, I delivered a Keynote Speech to 900+ graduates and guests about serving their way to the top in their respective fields 👨🏾‍🎓🚀  There’s nothing more rewarding than showing up in the world for other people, no matter how hard it may be ❤️ And we often need something bigger than ourselves to bring the best out! Thank you again for having me Hult International Business School, Ian Dougal, Matt Lilley and Manpreet (Mona) Dhillon. The marathon continues 🏁  #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Speaking #HumanitarianEngineer #Service

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: The struggles along the way are only there to help you with your purpose! 🙏🏾🎖️After receiving the MBE from Prince William, I caught up with his team. It’s always a pleasure to share more about the work and impact of Motivez 🚀One of my (mum’s) proudest moments 😅❤️The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I really enjoyed delivering the Keynote Speech on ‘Breaking Barriers’ at the EY Entrepreneur of the Year Retreat 🚀 It was great to meet the amazing finalists and memorable speakers like Steve Hewitt (Fmr CEO @ Gymshark), Susie Ma (CEO @ Tropic), David MacDonald (CEO @ Cullen) and Catie Munnings (Rally driver and my competitor 😅) who definitely inspired me to keep dream bigger.Beyond sharing my journey from fixing bikes in Peckham to sustainable motorsport with Lewis Hamilton’s race team, I shared insights I’ve picked up along the way from Motivez on: 1️⃣ Servant leadership - being the rising tide that lifts all boats2️⃣ Integrating purpose in high-performing businesses3️⃣ Leaving the ladder down for our communitiesA massive thank you to everyone for your comments and the EY team for making it happen - Victoria Price Lynn Rattigan, Rachel Beasley, Courtney Shields, Kerry Georgiou, my last minute DJ and everyone else behind the scenes! 👏🏾The future’s bright! The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #EYEntrepreneurOfTheYear #Speaking #HumanitarianEngineer #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Huge thanks to KPMG for recognising Motivez as the MOST PROMISING NON-PROFIT ORGANISATION!! 🎉🏆 Over the past 8 years, we've been committed to empowering underserved young people to access STEM jobs and become change-makers and with this new funding and support, we’ll be able to take this to the next level 🚀 If you want to be part of the movement, you can join us by:1️⃣ Signing up and sharing our Application Season Programme to get those dream jobs in STEM and beyond - Launching on Tuesday 7th November 🚀 2️⃣ Joining our amazing community of volunteers and mentors ❤️3️⃣ Partnering with us on our grassroots and employability programmes to increase equity in STEM 🤝Grateful to all that have wished us well along the way and continue to endorse us as we transcend these boundaries. The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #KPMG #BlackEntrepreneurAwards

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This is the BIGGEST transfer in sports history!! 🤯🏎️"Everybody is a Ferrari fan. Even if they say they're not, they are Ferrari fans. Even if you go to the Mercedes guys and they say ‘Mercedes is the best brand in the world’ they are Ferrari fans" ❤️At some point in our careers, we all need to take a risk… if you always wait till you’re ready, you’ll always be late. It seems like all the greats move to Ferrari… is it my time too? 😅🏆The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #Ferrari #LewisHamilton #Formula1

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE MADE THE PODIUM IN CHILE!!! 🏆🇨🇱🥳 On the first race day, we were the top qualifiers with great pace from both drivers 🏎️⚡️ That’s my 3rd podium since my promotion to the Race Engineer with TEAM X44! 🎉I’m forever grateful to all of you who have supported the journey and continue to inspire me ❤️🚀 Ending the season on a high! Let’s go!! The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Motorsport

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE’VE JUST SOLD OUT!!! 🤯🙌🏾🙏🏾That’s over TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY young people that we have the chance to directly impact this month to help secure their dream jobs in STEM (and beyond)!It’s an opportunity I don’t take for granted because I know how much all of my communities supported me to thrive on my journey into engineering and motorsport.Can’t wait to launch the Application Season programme sponsored by PwC and Salesforce next week and serve you all with the Motivez team.For every one of you that shared the opportunity, we can’t thank you enough ❤️We want to serve as many young people as possible so the waiting list is open and we’ll release tickets as more volunteers sign up. If you’re interested in supporting one of the evening sessions, please use the sign up link in the first comment👇🏾Let’s go get these dream jobs! 🚀The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Jobs #SoldOut

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Wrapped up last week celebrating some of the UK most exceptional Black talent at the Black Tech Achievement Awards 2024! 🎉 Massive congrats to all the nominees and winners across the categories 👏🏾 It was great to see so much of the Motivez community and friends like Eneni Abban who won the Inspiration Woman of the Year award 🏆 A young black girl from South London reimagining robotics and making it more accessible. Your story, and so many that were shared on the night, is an inspiration to us all! 💙 The dream is for rooms like this to be filled with Motivez changemakers who are leading the way 🚀 A massive shout out to Dr. Raphael Sofoluke and the BTA team on pulling off an exceptional night and building this platform for all of the heroes.The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #BlackTechAwards2024 #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Today I’ll be delivering the Keynote Speech at the EY Entrepreneur of the Year Retreat! 🎤 I’ll be speaking to 120+ entrepreneurs about breaking barriers through Motivez, building purposeful business and my journey from fixing bikes to racing for the planet 🏎️🌏 Let’s go!! 🙏🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Keynote #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This week I’m off for a little adventure!! ✈️ To a country that I’ve wanted to visit for YEARSSS 🌍 All I can say is that it’s an island country with some of the BEST FOOD! 🏝️🥘 BUT Jollof Rice will always be greater 😅 Can you guess? Sometimes you have to slow down to speed up! I’m excited to leave the racing behind for a short time and let the Motivez team to work their magic with all the upcoming programmes.The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #Travel #BirthdayMonth

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Landed in Sardinia for Round 7 and 8 of the Extreme E season! 🏎️🇮🇹 I always have to pinch myself at moments like this… racing these electric cars around the world with TEAM X44, keeping the ladder down through making motorsport engineering more accessible and living out my purpose ⚡️🌎 There’s nothing better than creating your own lane and paving the way for others! Engineering’s never looked so GOOD!! 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #SustainableMotorsport #STEM #IslandXPrix

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Today I’ll be moderating the opening keynote with my brother Kenny Imafidon and a STEM panel with Liseli, Eve and Natalina at the Social Mobility Factory! 🎤 It’s a full-circle moment to speak to 600+ young people about Ken’s career, journey as an entrepreneur and social commentator, and dig deeper on the content of his debut book - That Peckham Boy 📚 It’s about time so big shout out to The 93% Club for organising!The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Keynote #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Still feels pretty unreal that Beyoncé gave us multiple shout outs across her Renaissance World Tour!! 🤯🚀Who says the arts and STEM can’t interact 🙌🏾We’ve come a long way from that first meeting in Peckham Burger King Muizz!  So proud of the whole Motivez team for constantly pushing the boundaries and reimagining STEM engagement, particularly for young people typically far removed from the industry. Let’s keep serving our way to the top ❤️ There’s no limits! 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #YoungPeople #RenaissanceWorldTour #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This week, I’ve been travelling around the UK with the Motivez team and spoke with 800+ students. I shared practical tools and insights for their journeys, and showed them that a career in STEM might just be for them! 🎤 Pursuing your purpose and making positive change never get old! 🙅🏾‍♂️We’re on a mission to serve, give hope and build as many local change-makers as possible in STEM and beyond 👩‍💻 And it still feels like DAY 1! 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #STEM #HumanitarianEngineer #MotivezMindset #SocialImpact

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Finally in SCOTLAND with TEAM X44 for our HOMECOMING RACE!! 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🏎 We’ll be racing the electric cars around an old coal mine to raise awareness of how they’re transforming the location into a hydropower plant and wind farm ⚡️ From the track walk, the drivers will be really struggling for grip – especially if there’s some Scottish rain – as the course evolves and the clay is kicked up 🤦🏾‍♂️ Nevertheless, let’s bring it home! 🏆🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #SustainableMotorsport #HydroXPrix

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE’VE OFFICIALLY SOLD OUT!!! 🤯🙌🏾🙏🏾That’s another 250+ young people that will have the opportunity to learn from some inspiring mentors, build invaluable relationships and all the skills needed to secure their dream jobs in STEM (and beyond)!For every one of you that shared the opportunity, we can’t thank you enough. Massive shout out to our sponsors PwC and Salesforce for helping to bring this 7th cohort to life ❤️For those of you on the waiting list for Application Season, it’s not over! The Motivez team want to impact as many of you as possible so we’ve left the sign ups open as there might just be a spot for you as we sign up more mentors. Keep your eyes peeled on your emails 👌🏾Looking forward to launching this evening and serving you all. Let’s go get these dream jobs! 🚀The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Jobs #SoldOut #ApplicationSeason #AS2024

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: MEET THE TEAM behind the Motivez magic!! 🤩❤️I want to take a moment to appreciate the team and ambassadors for their dedication to shaking up the STEM space over the last 8 years and getting us to this position of growth 🚀So proud of every single one of you - and excited to see you go from strength to strength. Our future’s bright! Treasure O., Muizz Almaroof, Subira Ismail, Charlie B., Tasa O., Shemaiah Fenteng, Sonia M., Jadyn Abankwa, Adedoyin Adeyanju, Lindsay Ezeagu The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Team

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Finally settled back from Chile and reflecting on the double podium! 🏆🥉  Couldn't think of a better way to wrap up the 2023 campaign - 3 podiums in the last 3 races 🏎️ This year we’ve used the TEAM X44 platform to champion underrepresented voices and provide as many opportunities to the next generation of STEM talent - and the pictures show it all 🚀 Another year showing that inclusion and excellence go hand in hand 🤝  We might have not won the championship again this year but feeling stronger than I'veever been 💪🏾 For everyone in my community, thank you for always supporting me through this journey! Being able to represent is something I will always be proud of and regardless of how much we achieve, it will never change ❤️ The marathon continues 🏁  #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #RaceEngineer #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Super excited to be launching a new Motivez programme for GCSE, A-Level and IB students preparing for those exams!! 🎉🚀We know how stressful this season can be, so it’s about time we plugged the gap to support you all during this intense time. It’s taken years to get here but we’ve finally got you with “Exam Season” 💙 We’re bringing together some of the best experts in the StudyTube space and beyond to help you with revision and exam techniques in-person, online study sessions, accountability and a community to manage the stress whilst staying focused on this marathon 📚 Please share with your network and/or apply directly via: Link in the first comment 🔗If you have any questions feel free to DM me or email programmes@motivez.co.ukSign ups close on Sunday 21st April 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Talk about starting the year off with a BANG!💥 Last week we SOLD-OUT our ‘How to Smash Your 2024 Goals’ session in 48 hours in collaboration with Empowered By Vee where 200+ aspiring game-changers tuned in in-person and online 🚀Vee K. and I shared practical techniques on cultivating accountability, discipline and broke down exactly what is needed to achieve those personal and academic goals this year. Want more like this? Our Application Season Programme is right around the corner! 💥If you’re looking to upgrade your CV/cover letters, learn how to ace interviews/assessment centres and get tailored advice from relatable mentors then you don’t want to miss this one!Early bird applications in the first comment 👇🏾🚀#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #Employability #Collaboration #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: MASSIVE congrats to all of you getting your A-Level, T-Level and BTEC results today because it’s not easy 🎉🙌🏾 I remember not doing too great initially and being REJECTED from my top university choices for engineering. BUT it wasn’t the end of the world. It all came together in the end after ASKING FOR HELP, so remember the Motivez team is here if you just want a sounding board, as the majority of us have been through the rollercoaster of emotions 🎢Most of the us have done resits, gap years, clearing, adjustments, apprenticeships and unconventional routes so just pop the team message on Instagram - happy to help ❤️Don’t let results day define you. Whether you meet your expectations or fall short, it’s all about your response. Good luck! 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ResultsDay

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We’ve been blessed to have a lot of articles written about Motivez and the recent MBE but this one HITS HOME!! 🙏🏾I recently walked into my local 🇯🇲 shop for dinner and randomly found myself in the newspaper! 🗞️😅Grab your copy of The Peckham Peculiar if you’re around the area this month. Let’s show the kids what’s possible ❤️The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #MBE

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: From KEYNOTE SPEAKER to the EVENT HOST!! 🎤🤩 This time last year, I spoke to 200+ young people at REflect 2022, one of the most anticipated STEM events of the year.  The young people loved it. So much that I have the privilege of coming back to host this year! 🙏🏾 The line up is INCREDIBLE with some of the best in the STEM space! From Mohammad Taher inspiring millions into aviation to Biiftuu Aba-Godu, Krystina, Ama Frimpong, Navjot Sawhney, James Dornor, Dr. Joseph D.,  Veena Kumari, Dr Shini Somara BEng (Hons) EngD HonFIED and  Hayley Mulenda • FRSA 🔥  If you’re 16-25 and interested in STEM you don't want to miss this! As Motivez is also a youth partner, we have some limited tickets to join us all in London on 1st August so please check your inbox for our latest newsletter or comment below 👀 For your free ONLINE ticket, use link in the first comment 👇🏾 Massive thanks to Isabella Mascarenhas, Amy Muncer and whole RS Grass Roots team for pulling this all together.George The Poet did a great job last year so not easy shoes to fill but I'm looking forwardto the challenge!Let’s go!! 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁  #TheKidFromPeckham #REflect2023 #STEM #YoungPeople

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Following the success of the Prospering Peckham pilot, I'm excited to share that we’re growing the Motivez family and recruiting 10 TECHNOLOGY MENTORS to deliver ‘Sustainable Southwark’ to hundreds of kids! 🎉 This scaled up programme, funded by the Queens Platinum Jubilee Fund, will put underrepresented young people at the heart of climate action! 🎉If you're looking for a purposeful adventure to use your design experience and those volunteering hours to inspire and serve the next generation of underrepresented STEAM leaders then this could be the programme for you.What you’ll be doing:1️⃣ Mentoring students to design and prototype digital solutions to local climate issues over hackathons2️⃣ Help young people pitch their ideas to senior leaders3️⃣ Provide careers advice and guidance for studentsRegister your interest with the link in the first comment👇🏾Please share with your networks and any organisations who may be interested.#TheKidFromPeckham #STEM #YoungPeople #Mentor #ClimateChange #Sustainability #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: That’s a WRAP on our 6th cohort of Application Season with a 300+ SOLD-OUT programme! 🎉I think it’s safe to say this cohort was a SPECIAL one - One of the most engaged I’ve ever seen! So many great transformations and some dream jobs already secured 🚀The Motivez team had a blast so I hope you all enjoyed it too! The Art of Leverage & Celebration event was definitely my highlight to see some of you in-person 👏🏾 A massive thank you to the incredible young people that committed to the journey, our phenomenal speakers, mentors and partners - Dr Khadija Owusu, Sunny Yang (Zeying), Nana Badu, Charles Daker, Joseph Simeon, Dannique Blake, FRSA, Natasha Rodrigo, Mohammad Taher, PwC, Salesforce for making this all possible ❤️We’ll be sharing more over the next few days but in the meantime, we’ve got some post-programme support - so let’s go get these dream jobs 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #STEM #Jobs

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This time last year, I was nominated for The Black British Business Awards! 🏆🤵🏾‍♂️It was a whirlwind night that I’ll never forget… we won the prestigious BBBA Rising Entrepreneur Award sponsored by Barclays! 🚀 I also got a chance to celebrate so many amazing sisters and brothers in the community that I’m now blessed to work with 🤝 The nominations are open for 2024 but it closes TODAY! Take a few minutes to nominate an incredible Black British professional or entrepreneur in one of the six main categories:🎭𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐚👄 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐮𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐫𝐲💻𝐄𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐮𝐫💰𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬💼𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬🧬𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐌You won’t regret the experience! Link to nominate is in the first comment👇🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #TheBBBAwards #STEM #SocialImpact

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I’ll be speaking with Times Radio on Saturday about Motivez as we celebrate our eight years of impact and one of our biggest announcement yet! 🎉 I hope you can set those alarms for 7AM (BST) and tune in. If you’ve been following the journey till now, I promise you won’t want to miss this one! 🔥 The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: I’ll be on BBC Radio London tomorrow to discuss TfL renaming a tube station after me for National Engineering Day 🚀 I’ll also be sharing more on what we’re doing at Motivez to create the next generation of STEM icons and the sold-out Application Season programme that launches tomorrow 🚀 To all my early risers, I’ll see you there at 7:15AM 🙌🏾To the rest of you, it’s never too late to listen in so I’ll put the link for the playback in the comments once I’ve got it 👌🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #BBC #NationalEngineeringDay Royal Academy of Engineering

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Today marks the 3-year anniversary of launching the Motivez Application Season Programme!! 🎉🙌🏾1️⃣ We’ve helped thousands of young people secure jobs at companies such as Google, Facebook, Accenture, JP Morgan and Rolls Royce and now we’re launching SEASON 7! 🚀2️⃣ This will be for students and young people looking to upgrade CVs and cover letters, learn how to ace interviews/assessment centres and get tailored advice from relatable mentors to master the job application process 💎 3️⃣ The programme always sells out, so register ASAP for a spot and please share with at least one person that might benefit from the free coaching. There’s also giveaways for the people with the most referrals and PRIZES up to £200 throughout the programme! 👀💰Sign ups close on Friday 2nd February! Link in first comment 👇🏾Massive thank you to our sponsors such as PwC, UK Youth, and Salesforce who support us to make this happen ❤️#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #Jobs #YoungPeople #STEM

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: It’s so important to schedule time in to think if you want FOCUS…I usually put in a day, weekend or week in my calendar just to THINK in an inspiring environment. All of my greatest ideas, opportunities and decisions started with days I took off to think. We’re in a time where it’s so easy to get distracted, so it’s even more important to prioritise thinking space! 🔑💭  In typical ‘time-off’ fashion, I indulged in lots of different food - Beef Ragu with pasta made the top of my list 🍝 On the topic of pasta, I also caught up with David and Graihagh to chat about the future of lab-grown meats! 🥩 Within the next 5 years, you might just find it on your local Nando’s menu! Would you eat it? 👀 My second episode is now LIVE and in the comments - hope you enjoy it👇🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Podcast

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Inspiring the next generation of STEM!! ❤️How can we stop when we see children’s projects like this?! I’m so grateful we’ve been able to impact thousands of kids to pursue STEM for years to come through Motivez. We can never underestimate the power of representation and sharing our stories. For me, this is what it’s all about. What a wholesome way to start the week 🙌🏾The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #ForTheKids

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We recently ran an intimate Motivez session on “Elevating Your Personal Brand” and Goal setting with some of our Application Season Alumni! Wayne from our friends at RS Grassroots took us through ‘The 7 Components of Personal Branding’ - Passion, Authenticy, Story Telling, Impact on Others, Role Model, Mentoring & Legacy! 🙌🚀 Which components are you focussing on this year?If you want to join us for more sessions like this, we have our latest Application Season Programme launching next week! Link in first comment 🔗👇🏾#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #Community

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Towards the end of last year, Motivez won the KPMG UK award and funding for the most promising not-for-profit business! 🚀🎉We had the opportunity to share some of our plans to drive social mobility through STEM careers when we caught up with Chief People Officer, Karl E.We’re now full-swing into the KPMG Accelerator Programme, hiring and expanding our grassroots and employability programmes across London and the UK.Looking forward to building more partnerships as we develop the pipeline 🤝The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #BlackEntrepreneursAwards

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: The Exam Season Programme officially SOLD OUT in 2 weeks with 160+ young people!! 🎉🤯 This week, the Motivez team have started directly supporting them throughout this intense season of GCSE, A-Level and IB exams over the coming months and getting the 1st cohort ready for opportunities in STEM and beyond in the summer 👏🏾 One of the best feelings is creating what you wish you had! For me that’s what engineering is all about - solving problems and bringing ideas to life, whether it’s for a race track or a community 🚀Thank you to every single of you for sharing and supporting. The need in the room was HUGE so we’re excited to serve them all. The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #ForTheKids #HumanitarianEngineer

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: We kicked off International Women’s Day, working with 200+ girls in Year 10 & 11 from  Notre Dame School in South London, showing them how exciting a career in STEM can be 👩‍💻 As they join the Motivez Sustainable Southwark programme and competition for the next 4 months, we’re excited to impact all these girls and help change the narrative around women in STEM 🚀 We’re calling on women with a STEM background, or working in the industry to commit at least 4 hours to support these girls as mentors! If you’re interested, pop us a message or register your interest with the link in the comments 👇🏾Let’s continue to inspire and empower the next generation of women in STEM! The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #IWD #NationalCareersWeek #STEM #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: The Motivez marketing team are something else 😅🏆 Excited to kick off our Interviews & Assessment Centres session today with our friends at PwC 🚀 A massive thank you to the 10+ volunteers for giving up your time serve our community of young people with a timeless experience ❤️See you all there 🙌🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: THAT'S A WRAP on an incredible Application Season with Motivez!! 🎉Our 7th cohort SOLD-OUT with over 260+ young people - making it one of the youngest and most engaged we’ve seen over the years! We've been blessed to see so many great transformations and dream jobs in STEM and beyond already secured 🚀We're beyond grateful for all the support and messages we've received from our community. It's clear this one was special - with some “wishing it could last forever!". One of the highlights for me was The Art of Leverage & Celebration event, where we were blessed to see Mohammad Taher and Andrew Ologunebi in action 👏🏾 We couldn't have done it without our phenomenal speakers, mentors and partners like Salesforce, PwC and KPMG. Thank you for making this all possible ❤️But our journey doesn’t end here! We have some amazing after-care support lined up over the coming weeks to help you land those dream jobs and become changemakers 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁 #TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #STEM #Jobs

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: THE APPLICATION SEASON PROGRAMME IS LAUNCHING NEXT WEEK!! 🙌🏾🚀70% of the places are officially gone 🤯 The registrations are closing soon so please share this with any hungry students and young people still looking for those dreams jobs in STEM and beyond.The Motivez team have assembled the best of the best so I’m excited to announce this years incredible line-up in the coming days.The link to register is in first comment👇🏾 As I always say, “you miss 100% of the shots you don’t take” 🙏🏾The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #Jobs #Internships

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Nominations for the EY Entrepreneur Of The Year 2024 UK are officially OPEN! 🙌🏾I gave a keynote speech last year, at the community retreat with some of my incredible fellow entrepreneurs. Together, we explored strategies for integrating service with entrepreneurship, and how we’ve implemented these to advance the Motivez community - empowering underserved young people to thrive in STEM industries. Iron sharpens iron! 🚀 If you’re looking to elevate as an entrepreneur, embrace new challenges and learn from the best? Start your application today (link in first comment) 👇🏾Nominations close on Friday, 8th March 2024 🎯 #TheKidFromPeckham #EOYUK #Entrepreneur #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: WE ARE HIRING! 🚀 Excited to share that Motivez is expanding the team this summer 🥳If you’re passionate about social impact and developing the next generation of young changemakers in STEM, we’re #hiring for a few full-time roles. The first is within our programmes team:⭐️ Programme Manager: You’ll manage and deliver impactful programmes to empower and upskill thousands more underestimated young people and help them creatively access jobs in STEMLink to apply in the first comment 👇🏾Please share this with your friends and networks that are passionate about improving access to STEM opportunities 😊The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #STEM #YoungPeople #Jobs #SocialImpact

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: This is why we do it! ❤️🚀A massive thank you to all the Motivez team and mentors who make these moments possible. Results all within a matter of days 🙌🏾Excited for the Art of Leverage session hosted by our flagship sponsor PwC today 🎉#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: Following the success of the Prospering Peckham pilot, I'm excited to share that Motivez is growing and recruiting 20 TECHNOLOGY AND ENGINEERING MENTORS to deliver ‘Sustainable Southwark’ to hundreds of kids! 🎉 This scaled up programme and competition, supported by Royal Academy of Engineering, Salesforce, NCS - National Citizen Service Trust, will put underrepresented young people at the heart of climate action! 🎉If you're looking for a purposeful adventure to use your design experience and those volunteering hours to inspire and serve the next generation of underrepresented STEAM leaders then this could be the programme for you.What you’ll be doing:1️⃣ Mentoring students to design and prototype digital solutions to local climate issues over hackathons2️⃣ Help young people pitch their ideas to senior leaders3️⃣ Provide careers advice and guidance for studentsRegister your interest with the link in the first comment or mention below👇🏾Please share this with your networks and any organisations who may be interested.#TheKidFromPeckham #STEM #YoungPeople #Mentor #ClimateChange #Sustainability #MotivezMindset

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: TODAY’S THE DAY!! 🎤🤩 I’ll be hosting the SOLD-OUT REflect 2023 Youth Event with 200+ young people 🙌🏾 Excited to share countless gems from some of the best in the STEM space! We’ll be covering inspirational stories from 9+ speakers in Aerospace to Tech for Good, Motorsport and Cyber 🚀  If you’re 16-25 and interested in STEM you don't want to miss this! In-person tickets are all sold out but please join us online. For your free ONLINE ticket, use the link in the first comment 👇🏾 Let’s go!! 🚀 The marathon continues 🏁 RS, Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET), Association for Black and Minority Ethnic Engineers (AFBE-UK), Motivez, Inside Success Union C.I.C  #TheKidFromPeckham #REflect2023 #STEM #YoungPeople

Author: George Imafidon
Post Text: A MASSIVE THANK YOU to our incredible speakers Asia Sharif, Sophie Pender and Stephen Adeoye for kicking off the Motivez Application Season programme this week with so many gems to support our 7th cohort going for their dream jobs! 🚀 ⭐ Stephen encouraged them to do the most! "When you are operating in a saturated job market, just sending an application is never enough. Go above and beyond what you're asked to do to make you stand out." ⭐ Sophie stressed that failure is essential. "You don't have to bounce back immediately. Sit in your failure for a little bit. When you're ready, take yourself away from the emotion, face the facts and use your 'why' to bounce back"⭐ Asia reminded them to not fear rejection or embarrassment. "Show them how much you want it. Put yourself in the rooms you want to be in. Even if you're not invited, turn up!" All of them shared invaluable tips, candid advice and some very real stories which left us all with a lot to think about 💎 Looking forward to our next session on CVs and Cover Letters today🎉The marathon continues 🏁#TheKidFromPeckham #MotivezMindset #ApplicationSeason #STEM #Jobs
